subject: Re: FW: Bullet point copy - Patient Services
preview: Logged a total of 30 mins to Harvest

full_threads.body: Logged a total of 30 mins to Harvest

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Trudy, 

Great, confirming we have rolled this out to the other pages now. 

Please have a look and let us know if you would like any further changes.
@heath done with this task, thanks!

@rica can you please apply this new styling to the other pages. Here is a quick how to video:
https://www.loom.com/share/5a1de82a7dff42d0b00baaf1813fc908

Hi Heath,

That looks fantastic, thank you!

Yes, please apply to other pages.

Kind regards,

Trudy.

TRUDY MCENEARNEY​

MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER

235 Morrison Road

Ryde

NSW

2112

D.

+61 2 9808 9356

M.

0410 346 164

E.

Trudy.McEnearney@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Trudy, 

Please have a look at this page: https://www.metrorehab.com.au/patient-services-at-metro-rehab/patient-programs/inpatient-rehabilitation-programs/

We have added some light grey background to visually 'chunk' the text that was previously in lists. If you are happy with this solution, we can apply to the other pages. It seems to be a good fit given the side bar layout of this page and the restrictions that creates for columns etc. Let me know?

All good, thanks Heath.

TRUDY MCENEARNEY​

MARKETING AND COMMUNICATIONS MANAGER

235 Morrison Road

Ryde

NSW

2112

D.

+61 2 9808 9356

M.

0410 346 164

E.

Trudy.McEnearney@royalrehab.com.au

Hi Trudy, 

Just letting you know I haven't missed this one, we are determining the best way to tackle this. I'll let you know ASAP.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Heath Maguire

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,

Wondering if we can layout the copy slightly differently on the Metro Patient Services pages.

The Royal Rehab pages have two columns of text and coloured backgrounds in sections to break it up a bit for example. https://royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/ <https://royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/>

In particular, I find the bulleted copy a bit difficult to read.




Kind regards,

Trudy.

To: Trudy McEnearney <Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au <mailto:Trudy.McEnearney@Royalrehab.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Bullet point copy - Patient Services

Hey Trudy,

We can check with Heath to see if there are any slight design changes that can be easily implemented on Metro's website.

Currently due to the site theme we don't have the same editing capabilities as that of Royal.
Thanks
Brittany
